## PopulatedLiquityTransaction interface

A transaction that has been prepared for sending.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PopulatedLiquityTransaction<P = unknown, T extends SentLiquityTransaction = SentLiquityTransaction> 
```

## Remarks
